tweet: Congrats to the Chainlink hackathon winners at #ETHSF! 1st: Micro Subscription for SLA contracts. 2nd: Link Set for financial portfolio balancing. 3rd: B3PO for absentee ballot voting. Thanks to all the hackers who built awesome projects with Chainlink. #SFblockchainweek  https://t.co/vh0U4TE3QM

Some people have asked what I look into besides #XRP, so here you go:  At this moment, primarily 2nd layer solutions for #Ethereum and #Chainlink  I will not go into details but these are the things I am interested in, not as competition to #XRP but to diversify my portfolio.
If you missed @SergeyNazarov of #chainlink speak today check it out here, thanks to @CrushCrypto.   It was an honor to be there at today!   https://t.co/0chVGgCYRQ  $Link
